channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Despite Vatican-Israel tensions, Catholics and Jews work to build trust in Haifa
item.description: Religious leaders started getting together after Oct. 7, 2023, in the hope of preventing a repeat of Arab-Jewish violence that erupted after a previou...

item.title: U.S. and Ukraine reach consensus on key issues aimed at ending the war

item.title: Crime in the U.S. fell in 2025. Will the trend continue?
item.description: Crime rates dropped across much of the U.S. in 2025. That was true for both property and violent crime. And it declined nearly everywhere: In big citi...

item.title: Zelensky Opens Way to Demilitarized Zone in Eastern Ukraine to Reach Peace
item.description: The offer was the closest Mr. Zelensky has come to addressing the thorny territorial disputes in Donetsk that have repeatedly derailed peace talks.

item.title: The strangers who guided her home — and returned with Christmas dinner
item.description: Mary Klein had just moved to a new city when she got lost. A couple stopped to help and guided her home. They returned the next day with Christmas din...

item.title: A Christmas Argument That Ended in Harmony
item.description: Standing together on behalf of those who flee oppression is a very Christmas thing to do.

item.title: The Year America Blew Up the Process
item.description: The 2025 revolt against process signaled the final collapse of a powerful idea that once promised to hold the country together.

item.description: The country’s production of nuclear warheads has slowed, but its missiles may be poised to strike back fast in case of an attack, an annual assessment...

item.title: What does climate change look like? This year's hurricane season is one example
